changeSet.sql: CREATE SCHEMA orders; CREATE TABLE car_shop.orders.orders( order_id int GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY key, client int, constraint client_id FOREIGN key (client) references car_shop.persons_and_cars.persons (person_id), car int, constraint car_id FOREIGN key (car) references car_shop.persons_and_cars.cars (car_id), order_data date not null, order_status VARCHAR(100) not null ); CREATE TABLE car_shop.orders.service( service_order_id int GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY key, client int, constraint client_id FOREIGN key (client) references car_shop.persons_and_cars.persons (person_id), car int, constraint car_id FOREIGN key (car) references car_shop.persons_and_cars.cars (car_id), service_order_data date not null, service_order_status VARCHAR(100) not null, problem text not null );
